pkgmetadata.longdescription: ZMON CLI========.. _zmon-cli: https://github.com/zalando-zmon/zmon-cli.. _PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/zmon-cli/Command line client for the Zalando Monitoring solution (ZMON).Installation============Requires Python 3.4+.. code-block:: bash $ sudo pip3 install --upgrade zmon-cliExample=======Creating or updating a single check definition from its YAML file:.. code-block:: bash $ zmon check-definitions update examples/check-definitions/zmon-stale-active-alerts.yamlRelease=======1. Update zmon_cli/__init__.py in a PR with new version and merge2. Approve Release step manually in the CDP pipeline
